# Pull Request

## Summary

<!-- Provide a clear and concise description of what this PR does -->

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation only changes
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Code refactoring

<!-- If breaking change, describe what breaks and migration steps -->

## Changelog & Release

- [ ] Added changelog fragment in `changelog.d/` directory
- [ ] No changelog entry needed (add `no-changelog` label)
- [ ] This PR should trigger a release (add `release:patch`, `release:minor`, or `release:major` label)

## Testing & Quality

- [ ] All tests pass locally (`nox -s tests`)
- [ ] Linting and Type checking passes (`nox -s check`)
- [ ] Added tests for new functionality
- [ ] Updated documentation if needed
- [ ] Tested manually (if applicable)

## Review Checklist

- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] Self-review completed
- [ ] Added appropriate labels (`dependencies`, `no-changelog`, `release:*`, etc.)
- [ ] Linked related issues (closes #123)
- [ ] PR title follows conventional commits format (feat/fix/docs/etc.)
- [ ] All CI checks are passing
- [ ] Documentation updated if needed
